Oct 14

Use Honey to save money online and Amazon purchases

By Oscar | Comments 6

If you are anything like my wife, you love to save money when buying online and spend way too much time looking for working discount codes on sites such as RetailMeNot.com.

Honey is a Chrome extension that you can install and it will do the entire process for you automagically! With one click, it will search for coupon codes for you, test them on the fly and apply the best one with the biggest discount out the door taking into consideration shipping and taxes for a final price.

“The Honey extension is like having a thousand minions working for you to save some serious mula online.”

Secure your home with a Ring Pro smart doorbell camera

By Oscar | Comments 6

Convert your home into a smart home with the Ring Doorbell Pro.

If you want to feel more secure at home check out the Rind Doorbell Pro on Amazon. It is one of the best security upgrade you can make for your home while not spending an arm and a leg for it.

“After initial installation, the device has worked great and allows me to view who’s at my door from my iPhone.”
